name: OTP_INFO
description: This table stores basic information about a treatment plan order, such as its status, display name, which medication or procedure it represents, etc.

columns.name: OTP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient order template record.

columns.name: ORDER_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The order type of the order template in this row.
entries: jzj because we all need our own order type

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: ORDER_DESC
columns.description: The description of the order linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the order template in this row.

columns.name: PRESEL_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The pre-selection display name for the order template in this row.

columns.name: ORDER_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The order class of the order template in this row.

columns.name: RESULTING_AGENCY_ID
columns.description: The resulting agency ID of the order template in this row.

columns.name: RESULTING_AGENCY_ID_LLB_NAME
columns.description: Interface laboratory name.

columns.name: OTP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The status of the order template in this row. May be empty, or In Process (being released), or Converted (actually released).

columns.name: PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The priority of the order template in this row.
entries: 2-ED Urgent (ED Non-Trauma, Inpatient Trauma Spine Clearance)
3-IP Urgent (Acutely Ill patient, ICU, Discharge Pending Today)
4-OP Urgent (Clinic Appt <2 Hours Away, MD Awaiting Call, Tech Concerned)
6-IP Routine (Patient Not Acutely Ill, No Pending Discharge Today)

columns.name: ORDERING_QUANTITY
columns.description: The ordering quantity of the order template in this row.

columns.name: DX_FOLLOW_UP_C_NAME
columns.description: The diagnostic followup of the order template in this row.

columns.name: CHECK_OUT_COMMENT
columns.description: The check-out comments for the order template in this row.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The specimen type for the order template in this row.
entries: Jef! S<per Long Spec Type], Dr@wn} from - Deep & Within | The % Nervous $ System # =+

columns.name: SPECIMEN_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The specimen source for the order template in this row.
entries: Uterus w/Bilateral Ovaries and Fallopian Tubes

columns.name: ORD_SIGN_CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description: The context of revalidation for the order template in this row.
entries: Enroll in Native Two Factor Authentication
Anesthesia Narcotic Reconciliation First User Verification
Anesthesia Narcotic Reconciliation Second User Verification
Ambulatory Pharmacy Security Point Actions (Login User Missing Security)
Ambulatory Pharmacy Point Of Sale Workflow Resumption
Mobile E-Prescribing Controlled Medications - First Context
Mobile E-Prescribing Controlled Medications - Second Context

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the order record linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: STANDING_ORDER_C_NAME
columns.description: The standing status of the order template in this row, for example Standing or Future.

columns.name: STANDING_EXP_DATE
columns.description: The standing expiration date of the order template in this row.

columns.name: FUT_EXPECT_COMP_DT
columns.description: The future expected completion date of the order template in this row.

columns.name: FUT_APPROX_DT_YN
columns.description: The Y/N flag for the approximate future expected date for the order template in this row.

columns.name: STAND_INTERVAL
columns.description: The standing interval for the order template in this row.

columns.name: DISCRETE_INTERVAL_C_NAME
columns.description: The discrete interval selection for the order template in this row.

columns.name: STAND_OCCUR
columns.description: The standing occurrences for the order template in this row.

columns.name: STAND_ORIG_OCCUR
columns.description: The original number of standing occurrences for the order template in this row.

columns.name: PERFORMING_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The performing department for the order template in this row.

columns.name: REFG_PROV_ID
columns.description: The ID of the referring provider for the order template in this row.

columns.name: REFG_PROV_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: SER_ADDRESSID
columns.description: Stores the referring provider address ID for referral orders. The format is provider external ID - Address line number. For example, if provider external ID = 123 and Address line = 4, the value would be 123-4. If the referring provider has no address, this will store the provider external ID only.

columns.name: REFD_TO_PROV_ID
columns.description: The referred-to provider for the order template in this row.

columns.name: REFD_TO_FACILITY_ID
columns.description: The referred-to facility for the order template in this row.

columns.name: REFD_TO_SPECLTY_C_NAME
columns.description: The referred-to specialty for the order template in this row.
entries: CCM Housing Assistance and Shelter Services
CCM Financial Counseling and Assistance Services
CCM Language and Communication Assistance Services
ReCS <script>alert("This should not show up in a popup!!!");</script>

columns.name: DEPT_REF_TO_ID
columns.description: The referred-to department for the order template in this row.

columns.name: DEPT_SPEC_REF_TO_C_NAME
columns.description: The referred-to department specialty for the order template in this row.
entries: CCM Housing Assistance and Shelter Services
CCM Financial Counseling and Assistance Services
CCM Language and Communication Assistance Services
ReCS <script>alert("This should not show up in a popup!!!");</script>

columns.name: RFL_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral priority for the order template in this row.

columns.name: RFL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral type for the order template in this row. This links to ZC_RFL_TYPE.
entries: Non Auth/Cert but same workflow as Auth/Cert

columns.name: RSN_FOR_RFL_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason for referral for the order template in this row.

columns.name: RFL_NUM_VIS
columns.description: The referral number of visits for the order template in this row.

columns.name: RFL_EXPIRE_DT
columns.description: The referral expiration date for the order template in this row.

columns.name: PRN_COMMENT
columns.description: The user-entered comments for why the PRN medication should be administered.

columns.name: MED_ID
columns.description: The ID of the linked medication for the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_CONTACT_DAT
columns.description: The contact date of the linked medication for the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description: The route of the linked medication for the order template in this row.
entries: An Exceptionally long route used to see if we can get a second line on this sig for r

columns.name: MED_QUANTITY
columns.description: The quantity of the linked medication for the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_REFILLS
columns.description: The refill information for the linked medication for the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_DIRECTN_LONG
columns.description: The long version of the instructions for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: The start time of the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_END_TIME
columns.description: The end time of the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_END_DATE
columns.description: The end date of the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: DISP_AS_WRITTEN_YN
columns.description: The Y/N flag to dispense as written for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_DFL_DSCR_FRQ_YN
columns.description: The Y/N flag to indicate if this order template applied to a patient should default discrete frequency info for after-visit (take-home prescription) orders.

columns.name: MED_DFL_DSCR_DOS_YN
columns.description: The Y/N flag to indicate if this order template applied to a patient should default discrete dose info for after-visit (take-home prescription) orders.

columns.name: MED_NF_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The non-formulary code for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_COMMENTS
columns.description: The medication comments for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_NUM_OF_DOSES
columns.description: The number of doses for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MODIFIED_MIXTURE_YN
columns.description: The Y/N flag for whether the order template in this row is a modified mixture.

columns.name: MED_INFUSION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The infusion type for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_INFUSION_RATE
columns.description: The infusion rate for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_RATE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The units to use with the rate for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_INFUSE_DURATION
columns.description: The duration for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_DURATION_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The units to use with the duration of the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: TPN_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description: The infusion site of the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_VOLUME
columns.description: The volume of the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MED_VOLUME_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The units to use with the volume of the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: CALCULATE_VOLUME_YN
columns.description: The Y/N flag for whether or not the volume should be calculated for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: MIXTURE_CONC_C_NAME
columns.description: The concentration of a mixture (for fixed ratio mixtures) for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: DISCRETE_FREQ_ID
columns.description: The discrete frequency for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: DISCRETE_FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: DISCRETE_DOSE_MIN
columns.description: The minimum discrete dose for a medication whose dose was entered as a range, or the discrete dose amount for a medication whose dose was not entered as a range.

columns.name: DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The dose unit category for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: ORDER_TIME_PRIOR_C_NAME
columns.description: The discrete order time priority for the medication linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: ENC_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the encounter linked to the order template in this row.

columns.name: ORDER_FREQ
columns.description: The frequency of the medication being ordered in this order template.

columns.name: OTP_TPL_ID
columns.description: The ID of the treatment plan that contains this order template.

columns.name: OTP_TRG_ID
columns.description: The ID of the treatment day that contains this order template.

columns.name: DISCRETE_DOSE_MAX
columns.description: The maximum discrete dose for a medication whose dose was entered as a range.

columns.name: MAX_DOSE
columns.description: This column stores the suggested maximum dose amount for the patient order template record.

columns.name: MAX_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the suggested maximum dose unit for the patient order template record.

columns.name: OVRD_IMS_PROD_ID
columns.description: If the user has indicated that a specific product should be used for this order; that product will be stored here.

columns.name: INDICATION_COMMENTS
columns.description: User's comments for the corresponding Indications of Use (stored in OTP_INDICATIONS table)

columns.name: MED_DISP_QTY
columns.description: This item stores the medication dispense quantity when discrete dispense is enabled.

columns.name: MED_DISP_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the medication dispense unit when discrete dispense is enabled.

columns.name: MAX_BSA
columns.description: The maximum Body Surface Area (BSA) for an order, if the selected BSA is greater than this BSA than the selected BSA will be capped at this value.
